summary: Comprehensive testing of Cutting Corners gemstone cutter website completed. All major functionality working correctly including gallery with lightbox, booking form with correct dropdowns, shop functionality, and authentication system.

ui_bugs.issue: Modal overlay intercepting clicks during authentication flow

passed_tests: All 22 backend API endpoints working correctly
Home page hero section and navigation
Gallery page with sidebar categories and lightbox functionality
Shop page with products and category filtering
Booking form with correct service and stone type dropdowns
Booking thank you screen with phone number 480-285-4595
Category filtering in both gallery and shop
Featured items display on home page
